channel.title: [Java] New Game (ICT Company) Dev Underway! [TEXT BASED]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Guys, Finally a game from quirq! :D[/size] [size=14pt]So this game is about a new company in town; Yours :D and you can manafacture hardware and software, which all costs to make better things, you can choose how much ram you want in a new Desktop or Laptop 2GB to 32GB and either 32 or 64 bit operating systems :)
Its just a text based game, because I'm not too smart :(
Also you will be able to make consoles later in the game :) Maybe...
But, don't expect anything for 4-5 weeks because good things take time :)
Thanks in advance for your support :)[/size]
